statements: SELECT * FROM drug_target_interaction;
SELECT drug_id, target_id, interaction_type FROM drug_target_interaction WHERE interaction_strength > 0.5;
SELECT drug_id, target_id, interaction_strength FROM drug_target_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'agonist';
SELECT target_id, interaction_type FROM drug_target_interaction WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(interaction_strength) AS highest_strength FROM drug_target_interaction;
SELECT drug_id, target_id, interaction_type, interaction_strength FROM drug_target_interaction WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drug_target_interaction WHERE target_id = 2;
SELECT drug_id, target_id FROM drug_target_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'agonist';
SELECT target_id, drug_id, interaction_strength FROM drug_target_interaction WHERE interaction_strength > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM drug_target_interaction ORDER BY interaction_type DESC, interaction_strength ASC;
SELECT drug_name FROM Drug WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, target_id FROM Drug WHERE target_id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, target_id FROM Drug WHERE target_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Drug WHERE drug_id = 2;
SELECT target_name, target_type FROM Target;
SELECT drug_name FROM Drug WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT target_name, target_type FROM Target WHERE target_id = 2;
SELECT drug_name, target_name FROM Drug JOIN Target ON Drug.target_id = Target.target_id;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, target_name FROM Drug JOIN Target ON Drug.target_id = Target.target_id WHERE target_type = 'Protein';
SELECT * FROM Drug WHERE drug_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction
SELECT drug_id, target_id, interaction_type FROM drug_interaction WHERE target_id = 5
SELECT drug_name, description FROM drug WHERE drug_id = 3
SELECT target_name, description FROM target WHERE target_id = 1
SELECT drug_name, target_name, interaction_type FROM drug d JOIN drug_interaction di ON d.drug_id = di.drug_id JOIN target t ON di.target_id = t.target_id
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction WHERE drug_id = 1 AND interaction_type = 'Direct' ORDER BY target_id DESC;
SELECT drug_name, description FROM drug WHERE target_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND drug_name LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT target_name, description FROM target WHERE target_name = 'Cancer' OR description LIKE '%mutation%' ORDER BY target_id;

SELECT drug_name, target_name, interaction_type FROM drug_interaction JOIN drug ON drug_interaction.drug_id = drug.drug_id JOIN target ON drug_interaction.target_id = target.target_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Indirect' ORDER BY drug_name, target_name;
SELECT drug_id, target_id, interaction_type FROM drug_interaction WHERE drug_id = 2 OR target_id = 3 AND interaction_type != 'Inhibited' ORDER BY target_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM drugs;
SELECT drug_name, description FROM drugs WHERE drug_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT target_name FROM targets WHERE target_type = 'Enzyme';
SELECT drug_name, target_name, interaction_result FROM drugs JOIN interactions ON drugs.drug_id = interactions.drug_id;
SELECT drug_name, target_name, interaction_date FROM drugs JOIN interactions ON drugs.drug_id = interactions.drug_id WHERE interaction_result = 'Positive';
SELECT drug_name, description FROM drugs;
SELECT target_name, target_type FROM targets WHERE target_type = 'Protein';
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM drugs JOIN drug_target_interaction ON drugs.drug_id = drug_target_interaction.drug_id;
SELECT drug_name, target_name, interaction_result FROM drugs JOIN interactions ON drugs.drug_id = interactions.drug_id JOIN targets ON interactions.target_id = targets.target_id;

SELECT drug_name, target_name, interaction_result FROM drugs JOIN interactions ON drugs.drug_id = interactions.drug_id JOIN targets ON interactions.target_id = targets.target_id WHERE interaction_result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM drug;
SELECT name, description FROM drug WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM target ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT assay_type FROM assay WHERE description LIKE '%study%';
SELECT id, result_value FROM assay_results WHERE result_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM drug ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT d.name, i.interaction_type, ar.result_value FROM drug d JOIN interaction i ON d.id = i.drug_id JOIN assay_results ar ON i.id = ar.interaction_id WHERE ar.result_value > 0 ORDER BY ar.result_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT t.name AS target_name, COUNT(i.id) AS num_interactions FROM target t LEFT JOIN interaction i ON t.id = i.target_id GROUP BY t.name ORDER BY num_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT d.name AS drug_name, t.name AS target_name, a.assay_type FROM drug d JOIN interaction i ON d.id = i.drug_id JOIN target t ON i.target_id = t.id JOIN assay_results ar ON i.id = ar.interaction_id JOIN assay a ON ar.assay_id = a.id WHERE a.assay_type = 'Binding Assay' ORDER BY d.name, t.name LIMIT 5;

SELECT d.name AS drug_name, COUNT(ar.id) AS num_assays FROM drug d JOIN interaction i ON d.id = i.drug_id JOIN assay_results ar ON i.id = ar.interaction_id GROUP BY d.name ORDER BY num_assays DESC LIMIT 5;
